entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
